trans-unit.source: Creates a Blur class effect object

seg-source.mrk: Creates a Blur class effect object

target.mrk: Creates a Blur class effect object

trans-unit.source: [optional] Real number that specifies the blur radius (the radius of the Gaussian convolution kernel) in pixels.

seg-source.mrk: Real number that specifies the blur radius (the radius of the Gaussian convolution kernel) in pixels.

target.mrk: Real number that specifies the blur radius (the radius of the Gaussian convolution kernel) in pixels.

trans-unit.source: The radius must be in the range 0.0 through 255.0.

seg-source.mrk: The radius must be in the range 0.0 through 255.0.

target.mrk: The radius must be in the range 0.0 through 255.0.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Boolean value that specifies whether the bitmap expands by an amount equal to the blur radius.

seg-source.mrk: Boolean value that specifies whether the bitmap expands by an amount equal to the blur radius.

target.mrk: Boolean value that specifies whether the bitmap expands by an amount equal to the blur radius.

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, the bitmap expands by an amount equal to the radius so that it can have soft edges.

seg-source.mrk: If TRUE, the bitmap expands by an amount equal to the radius so that it can have soft edges.

target.mrk: If TRUE, the bitmap expands by an amount equal to the radius so that it can have soft edges.

trans-unit.source: If FALSE, the bitmap remains the same size and the soft edges are clipped.

seg-source.mrk: If FALSE, the bitmap remains the same size and the soft edges are clipped.

target.mrk: If FALSE, the bitmap remains the same size and the soft edges are clipped.

trans-unit.source: a handle to an Effect object.

seg-source.mrk: a handle to an Effect object.

target.mrk: a handle to an Effect object.

trans-unit.source: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

seg-source.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

target.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

trans-unit.source: -1 - GDIPlus.dll does not support this function.

seg-source.mrk: -1 - GDIPlus.dll does not support this function.

target.mrk: -1 - GDIPlus.dll does not support this function.

trans-unit.source: When you are done with the Effect object, call _GDIPlus_EffectDispose() to release the resources.

seg-source.mrk: When you are done with the Effect object, call _GDIPlus_EffectDispose() to release the resources.

target.mrk: When you are done with the Effect object, call _GDIPlus_EffectDispose() to release the resources.
